sentences.sContent: Now immediately we can see that this is an epistle which has a great deal to teach us as we live in the last times of the Gentiles.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now immediately we can see that this is an epistle which has a great deal to teach us as we live in the last times of the Gentiles.
sentences.sCn: 现在我们能看见当我们住在非犹太人的最后时期，这是一封常常有教我们的书信。

sentences.sContent: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
sentences.sContent_eng: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
sentences.sCn: 你们念了这书信，便交给老底嘉的教会，叫他们也念。 你们也要念从老底嘉来的书信。

synos.tran: 书信；使徒书；书信体诗文

words.tran: 书信的；书信体的；用书信的
